#Fonction de von B

```{r}
L = 71.830
K = 0.666
t0 = 2014

x = c(2016:2022)
y = L*(1-exp(-K*(x-t0)))

ggplot(data = data.frame(x,y), aes(x = factor(x), y = y))+ 
  geom_point ()
```
